title: Narco.Terror-RELOADED
description:
nERv

Narco Terror (c) Deep Silver

07/2013 :..... RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION .......: Steam
1 :.......... DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE ........: FPS

Dishing out justice, one grenade at a time Narco Terror combines the good
of the old and the amazing of the new in an action-packed twin-stick shooter
about an over-the-top one-man war against a drug cartel.
In true arcade-style, it is filled with unlimited ammo, ear-splitting
grenades, huge explosions, massive tanks, armed helicopters and fast planes
1-2 players drop in/out, local and online. Diverse over-the top Arcade
shooter action

Features

- Drop in / drop out Multiplayer (offline/online
- Customise and Upgrade your weapons
- An exhilarating blast to the 80s
- 12 challenging missions

1. Unrar
2. Burn or mount the image
3. Install the game.
4. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory on the image to
your game install directory
5. Play the game offline
6. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT
